about.title: About Me
paragraphs: I am a frontend developer passionate about creating accessible and inclusive digital experiences. With a solid background in web development and a user-centered approach, I always seek to implement solutions that not only work well but are usable by everyone.

My journey in development began with a curiosity about how things work on the web, and it evolved into a passion for creating interfaces that make a difference in people's lives. I believe that technology should be a tool for inclusion, not exclusion.
When I'm not coding, I enjoy staying up-to-date with the latest trends in UX/UI, participating in developer communities, and contributing to open-source projects.
